about_the_game:
It'll Be The Best Month Ever! is a complete collection of 29 beautiful, expressive, folk, country and jazz-inspired melodies prepared by the composer Jędrzej Bączyk (Pan Jędras). The stunning, nearly 80-minute original soundtrack is an excellent addition to the narrative adventure game about Louise and her son Mitch's best month together.

Best Month Ever! OST is an adventure through the American traditions of country and folk music where regional and ethnic influences mix and create the musical soundscape of the main characters' journey across the 1960s USA. Immerse yourself in this musical adventure, and indulge in the jazz trumpet sounds of Frank’s quartet and other performing artists.

This will be your best soundtrack ever!
